member.name: PenType
member.summary: The PenType enumeration indicates the type of pattern, texture, or gradient that a pen draws.

member.name: PenType.PenTypeSolidColor
member.summary: Indicates that the pen draws with a solid color.

member.name: PenType.PenTypeHatchFill
member.summary: Indicates that the pen draws with a hatch pattern that is specified by aHatchBrush object.

member.name: PenType.PenTypeTextureFill
member.summary: Indicates that the pen draws with a texture that is specified by aTextureBrush object.

member.name: PenType.PenTypePathGradient
member.summary: Indicates that the pen draws with a color gradient that is specified by aPathGradientBrush object.

member.name: PenType.PenTypeLinearGradient
member.summary: Indicates that the pen draws with a color gradient that is specified by aLinearGradientBrush object.

member.name: PenType.PenTypeUnknown
member.summary: Indicates that the pen type is unknown.
